@ParametersAreNonnullByDefault

Package org.prebake.service

The prebakery executable as speced on the wiki.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Interface Description
Config Configuration for the Prebakery service.
EntityLinker Produces HTML links for entities that appear in log output.
 

Class Summary
Class Description
ArtifactDescriptors Maps NonFileArtifacts to strings that can be part of a file path for use with a LogHydra.
BuiltinResourceLoader Allows loading JavaScript files that are on the classpath by tool and plan files.
HighLevelLog A high level log that allows for a compact view of recent activity.
LogHydra A many headed tee that sits on top of stdout and stderr and redirects the output to log files for whatever operations are happening.
Logs A bundle of logging related objects.
Main An executable class that hooks the Prebakery to the real file system and network, and starts it running.
Prebakery A service that services requests by the Main.
PrebakeScriptLoader A loader implementation that tries to satisfy load requests based on the BuiltinResourceLoader or a FileVersioner as appropriate, and that keeps track of the versions of files loaded so that NonFileArtifacts can be kept up-to-date.
 

Enum Summary
Enum Description
LogHydra.DataSource Sources of data that might need to make it to a log file.
 

Package org.prebake.service Description

The prebakery executable as speced on the wiki.
